attributes.action: we request that dixie dean is made sir dixie dean
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i as a proud everton football club surporter want william ralph dean to be nighted a sir for his rule in football also for his unbeaten record on 60 goals in a season. i think that if anyone in football deserves an hounor its dixie dean him self

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
